summary: Removes blood splash on screen, weapons and scenery. Will remove more as I can.
descriptionHtml:
A quick texture replace pack to remove the blood splatter on your screen when you take damage, as well as all the blood decals that get thrown around during combat.

What does away at the moment:

- Screen blood
- Blood splashes on player weapons/hands
- Blood decals from combat
- Blood effect textures used by meshes, eg, combat hit effects

To do:

- Replace impact effects rather than make them invisible, since seeing hits is still useful


INSTALLATION:

Extract texture folder into your Skyrim directory.
...\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

Make sure you REPLACE any duplicate files.


Please don\'t ask what the point is, some people love fantasy RPGs, but hate the sight of all the blood in Skyrim.
author: Zulaxia
